short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rewards Search Automator - performs the bing searches automatically in single click to earn Microsoft Rewards points.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are moved to a new URL!!  >>>  https://bit.ly/rewards_search__automator


Effortlessly maximize your Microsoft Rewards points with a single click using our Bing Search Automation Chrome Extension - Rewards Search Automator. This innovative tool automates Bing searches, supercharging your Bing Rewards journey.

**What's New:**
- Experience enhanced search techniques for precise and effective automation.
- We value your privacy - our extension now requires minimal permissions for secure browsing.
- Customize your search speed, from a deliberate 2 seconds per search to lightning-fast 750ms.
- Achieve an impressive 99% success rate on mobile searches with refined mechanisms.
- Enjoy an intuitive user interface for seamless navigation and control.
- Fine-tuned mobile search functionality for superior accuracy.
- Stay informed with a dynamic progress bar tracking your search activity.
- Optimized performance with "Fast" mode completing searches in just 750ms.
- Diversify your search patterns with an expanded range of mobile device simulations.
- Add an element of unpredictability with random mobile devices.
- Flexible search timing, accommodating different PC capabilities.
- Access over 350,000+ search terms for increased search diversity.
- Benefit from subtle refinements for an enhanced search experience.
- Unlock the power of automated Bing searches and elevate your Bing Rewards experience. Whether you're aiming to earn rewards or simply optimize your routine, our tool has you covered.

Control your search speed, balance precision and efficiency with "Slow," turbocharge your searches with "Fast," or enjoy the best of both worlds with "Variable." Boost your points, and reap the benefits of your Bing Rewards journey with Rewards Search Automator (also known as Bing Search Automator or Auto Searcher for Bing).
